post.description: Register a new user. Only admin can create users.

Change user password. Only admin can change passwords.
If user_id is provided, changes that user's password.
If user_id is not provided, changes admin's own password.

schema.title: Response Change Password Api V1 Auth Change Password Post
Response Read Products Api V1 Products  Get
Response Open Session Api V1 Cash Open Post

get.description: Get current master password. Only admin can view it.

post.description:
Update master password. Only admin can change it.
This password is used for discounts and refunds authorization.

schema.title: Response Update Master Password Api V1 Config Master Password Post
